text: in serious crisis the price of
everything has gone up except the price
of red here at a government bakery all
Syrian families rely on these round flat
pieces of bread one piece alone costs
the equivalent of one cent that price
hasn't changed for some 20 years and
that's why the queues are long here at
this bakery they line up at all hours of
the day men women young children coming
to get the family bread just listen to
the sounds as people push forward trying
to get the bread here at this government
bakery there's enough flour and fuel to
provide to all those who make their way
here it's not the same elsewhere in
Syria in some parts of this country
especially in the areas cut off by war
there's no bread at all to be found even
on the outskirts of Damascus areas cut
off either by the government or by rebel
forces no bread at all is getting in the
tragedy of this conflict in Syria is
that even bread the denial of bread has
become a weapon of war
